name: HubLogix, Inc.
description: Provider of a cloud-based e-commerce platform intended to integrate, manage and optimize merchandise sales. The company's cloud-based e-commerce platform connects inventory management services, third-party logistics providers and wholesale distributors to provide a seamless link from an e-commerce platform to one or many fulfillment points to automate inventory, orders and shipment updates enable retailers and branded manufacturers to work in a flexible way.
one_liner: Provider of a cloud-based e-commerce platform intended to integrate, manage and optimize merchandise sales.
